contest-event.event-date:
Sept. 3, 1955 D British Open
British Open 1 Test Piece Contest
british-open
Sinfonietta for Brass Band [Leidzen]
Belle Vue, Manchester, Greater Manchester, England, UK Prizes:
1st: 150 plus 2,000 Gold Trophy plus 'Sunday Chronicle' Trophy. 2nd: 120 plus The Frank Parker Memorial Cup. 3rd: 80 4th: 50 5th: 30 6th: 20
Each member of the winning band received engraved certificates.
The test piece was specially composed for the contest.
The Iles Medal was presented to Stanley Boddington.
(Courtesy of www.4barsrest.com)
Feb. 8, 2011, 12:29 p.m. Feb. 8, 2011, 12:40 p.m.
